name: Super Naughty Maid 2
description:
Story
Leona, your cute and lewd maid is back for more in Super Naughty Maid 2!
With her services coming to an end, she wants to see how her beloved master has improved as she puts him to the test.FeaturesFully animated artwork brings Leona to life.
Improved animation and quality that really shows off the realistic softness of each motion.
Multiple scenes and positions to choose from as well as new variations from the previous game.
Over 60 minutes of recorded voice.
Listen to Leona's perverted thoughts with the lewd voice function.
Optional English subtitles
